title: 自定义交易村民求助
author: z99891179
txt_content: 如何用命令生成一个用装有物品的潜影盒来换物品的村民，不能用MOD修改

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
例子:summon Villager ~ ~ ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:15,buy:{id:"shulker_box",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{Item:[{Slot:0b,id:"minecraft:dirt",Count:1b}]}},sell:{id:"diamond",Count:9b}}]}}

效果:将泥土放进白色潜影盒的第一个格子可以跟村民换9个钻石

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
泥土必须也是一个，修改dirt的Count可以更改数量
修改潜影盒的Damage可以改变颜色
